name: Cactus Fruit 3-in-1 Styling Cream with Taming Wand
categories: Hair, Hair Styling & Treatments, Hair Styling Products
about: What it is:A bestselling styling cream with a built-in taming wand that slicks down flyaways, tames frizz, and styles edges..Hair Texture:Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily.Hair Type:Fine, Medium, and Thick.Hair Concerns:- Frizz.Key Benefits:- Slicks flyaways.Highlighted Ingredients:- Dragon Fruit: Locks in moisture and is rich in antioxidants..Ingredient Callouts:This product is vegan and cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:Slick back styles with one easy swipe. This bestselling, multitasking cream, now with a built-in wand applicator, is your new secret weapon for taming flyaways, smoothing frizz, and styling edges. Conveniently stash it in your purse for touch-ups on the go. Hair is left frizz-free, smooth, and infused with daeu2019s signature citrus scent..Fragrance Description:Infused with sweet notes of luminous citrus, orange blossom, and vanilla, daeu2019s signature citrus scent is a warm, floral fragrance reminiscent of summer ease. Imagine sunlit mornings spent squeezing fresh juice by hand; afternoons running barefoot through wild, open orchards; and quiet evenings dozing as citrus trees sway with the breeze...Clean at SephoraOur commitment to offering formulas that go beyond regulatory standards to avoid controversial ingredients without sacrificing effectiveness.
ingredients: -Dragon Fruit: Locks in moisture and rich in antioxidants. .-Cactus Flower Extract: Strengthens elasticity and improves manageability..-Prickly Pear Seed Oil: Adds shine and softens by hydrating and nourishing hair...Water, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glycerin, Neopentyl Glycol Diheptanoate, Propanediol, Behentrimonium Chloride, Cetrimonium Chloride, Citrus Sinensis (Orange) Peel Oil, Dimethicone, VP/VA Copolymer, Ceteareth-20, Fragrance, Isopropanol, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Linum Usitatissimum Seed Extract, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Vitis Vinifera (Grape Seed) Seed Oil, Phenoxyethanol, Salvia Hispanica Seed Extract, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Hexylene Glycol, Polyquaternium-73, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Opuntia Ficus-Indica (Prickly Pear) Seed Oil, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Hylocereus Undatus Fruit Extract, Tocopherol, Moringa Oleifera (Moringa) Leaf Extract, Cereus Grandiflorus Extract, Citric Acid.
how_to_use: - Use the wand to tame flyaways, smooth frizz, and style edges.
